member.name: RotateFlipType
member.summary: The RotateFlipType enumeration specifies the direction of an image's rotation and the axis used to flip the image.

member.name: RotateFlipType.RotateNoneFlipNone
member.summary: Specifies no rotation and no flipping.

member.name: RotateFlipType.RotateNoneFlipX
member.summary: Specifies no rotation and a horizontal flip.

member.name: RotateFlipType.Rotate90FlipX
member.summary: Specifies a 90-degree rotation followed by a horizontal flip.

member.name: RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipX
member.summary: Specifies a 180-degree rotation followed by a horizontal flip.

member.name: RotateFlipType.Rotate270FlipX
member.summary: Specifies a 270-degree rotation followed by a horizontal flip.

member.name: RotateFlipType.RotateNoneFlipY
member.summary: Specifies no rotation and a vertical flip.

member.name: RotateFlipType.Rotate90FlipY
member.summary: Specifies a 90-degree rotation followed by a vertical flip.

member.name: RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipY
member.summary: Specifies a 180-degree rotation followed by a vertical flip.

member.name: RotateFlipType.Rotate270FlipY
member.summary: Specifies a 270-degree rotation followed by a vertical flip.

member.name: RotateFlipType.RotateNoneFlipXY
member.summary: Specifies no rotation, a horizontal flip, and then a vertical flip.

member.name: RotateFlipType.Rotate90FlipXY
member.summary: Specifies a 90-degree rotation followed by a horizontal flip and then a vertical flip.

member.name: RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipXY
member.summary: Specifies a 180-degree rotation followed by a horizontal flip and then a vertical flip.

member.name: RotateFlipType.Rotate270FlipXY
member.summary: Specifies a 270-degree rotation followed by a horizontal flip and then a vertical flip.
